channel.title: How do you burn Microsoft Frontpage and Office to a CD?
channel.description:
Hey mates,
How are you? I want to burn my microsoft office professional 2003 and microsoft frontpage 2003 to one cd. Is this possible? I have the cds and everything, but I don't know how to make it so I can combine them. It doesn't matter if it can't autoplay, but it would be good if it did. Also, if it is possible, can I make my windows xp professional cd go onto this cd that will contain microsoft office and frontpage. I want to combine all these so I can just use one cd instead of three.
Any help will be appreciated.
Thanks, Leader

item.title: How do you burn Microsoft Frontpage and Office to a CD?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

You could…you can’t use the same autoruns for all of them. But yes, if you have each cd’s contents in a separate directory it should work fine, as long as they don’t exceed the limit of the cd.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you burn Microsoft Frontpage and Office to a CD?
